block.p: Erin Kelly, a daughter of Joanne and Ray Kelly, was married yesterday to Justin John Burke, the son of Joan Martin Burke of New York and Francis Burke of Toronto. The Rev. Bruce Clements, a Congregational minister, officiated at the Players Club in New York.

Ms. Kelly, 34, who is keeping her name, is an editor and writer for Fortune magazine in New York. She graduated cum laude from Yale University. Her father owns the Angeles Group, a maker of tricycles in Pacific, Mo. Her mother is the principal of McGrath Elementary School in Brentwood, Mo.

Erin Kelly, a daughter of Joanne and Ray Kelly, was married yesterday to Justin John Burke, the son of Joan Martin Burke of New York and Francis Burke of Toronto. The Rev. Bruce Clements, a Congregational minister, officiated at the Players Club in New York.

Ms. Kelly, 34, who is keeping her name, is an editor and writer for Fortune magazine in New York. She graduated cum laude from Yale University. Her father owns the Angeles Group, a maker of tricycles in Pacific, Mo. Her mother is the principal of McGrath Elementary School in Brentwood, Mo.

Mr. Burke, 35, is the managing editor of Eurasianet, a Web site based in New York offering news and information on Central Asia and the Caucasus, and which is operated by George Soros's Open Society Institute. He graduated magna cum laude from Boston University and was a visiting scholar at the Davis Center for Russian Studies at Harvard University. His mother is a partner in the Fred Group, a video production company in New York.
